<h1 align="center">
  Bergen STEM 2.0
</h1>

![Bergen STEM Landing](https://i.imgur.com/bAL2hBT.jpg)

Website designed and built for the STEM program at Bergen Community College. Built using [GatsbyJS](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/) and the [Netlify-CMS](https://www.netlifycms.org/).
